tasks.task: Rinse measuring cylinder and add water to spray liquid.
subtasks: Fill measuring cylinder with water.
Rinse measuring cylinder three times.
Pour rinse water into spray liquid.
If pesticide containers are empty, rinse them with water.
Pour container rinses into sprayer tank twice more.

tasks.task: Replace the sprayer tank lid.
subtasks: Close the sprayer tank.
Ensure lid is secure.

tasks.task: Agitate the sprayer to mix product and water.
subtasks: Shake or stir the sprayer tank.
Ensure even mixing of pesticide and water.

tasks.task: Check website for pesticide use information.
subtasks: Open web browser or device.
Visit the provided website URL.
Look for information on pesticide use.
Note appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE) details.

tasks.task: Rinse the measuring cylinder three times and add this water to the spray liquid.
subtasks: Fill the measuring cylinder with water.
Rinse the measuring cylinder three times.
Pour the rinse water into the spray liquid.

tasks.task: If you have emptied any pesticide containers, also rinse them with water and add the rinsing water into the sprayer tank. Do this twice more.
subtasks: Check if pesticide containers are empty.
If yes, rinse them with water.
Pour the container rinses into the sprayer tank two times.

tasks.task: Replace the tank lid.
subtasks: Close the sprayer tank lid.
Ensure the lid is properly closed.

tasks.task: Agitate the sprayer to mix the product with the water.
subtasks: Shake or stir the sprayer tank gently.
Check if the pesticide and water are well mixed.

tasks.task: For more information about using pesticides and which PPE to use, visit our website.
subtasks: Open a web browser or device.
Navigate to the specified website.
Search for pesticide usage guidelines.
Note the recommended personal protective equipment (PPE).
